<title level="1" right="Rules">[Stabilizers](/Rules.aspx?ID=1661)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 182</row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
The ferocious kickback of firearms is part of the functionality that makes them so appealing as weapons, but it can also present a barrier in wielding them effectively. To increase the functionality of firearms and make them more accessible to a wider audience, gunsmiths and engineers have created a large array of supporting stabilization over the years. From the humble [tripod](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1207) to more elaborate arrays like the gunner's saddle, these tools can be an invaluable part of any gunner's loadout.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
